name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Anthony MEDINA, Jr., Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Anthony MEDINA, Jr., Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 11th day of September, 2012, the Petition for Leave to File Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tunc is GRANTED. Counsel is directed to file a Petition for Allowance of Appeal -within 30 days of this order.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
52 A.3d 1212
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Anthony MEDINA, Jr., Petitioner.
No. 107 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 11, 2012.
